StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOssWFVContactCardRows]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgId uniqueiden..er = null, @RecruiterId uniqueiden..er = null, @ScheduledEventsStart date.me, @ScheduledEventsEnd date.me, @EventTypeId int = null, @OnlyNextScheduledEvent bit = 1 )
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @Organiza.onID INT
SELECT @Organiza.onID = ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION WHERE rowguid = @orgid
SELECT rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, rp.rowguid, rp.RANK_CODE, rcrtr.LAST_NAME, rcrtr.FIRST_NAME, rcrtr.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME INTO #Recrui.ngPerson FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] rp INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[dbo].[PERSON] rcrtr ON rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = rcrtr.PERSON_ID WHERE --((rp.RowGuid = @RecruiterId AND @RecruiterId IS NOT NULL) OR (@RecruiterId IS NULL)) rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onId
SELECT [ContactCardId] AS ID, [DatePrepared], [ContactLName] AS LastName, [ContactFName] AS FirstName INTO #TempContactCard FROM MCRISS.[USMC].[ContactCard] WHERE [Organiza.on_Id] = @Organiza.onID
SELECT e.StartDate AS NextEvent INTO #NextEvent FROM #TempContactCard cc INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es ON es.SubjectID = cc.ID INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].Event e ON e.id = es.even.d WHERE e.StartDate >= GetDate() AND EventSourceId = 14 AND e.[Organiza.onId] = @Organiza.onID
SELECT es.SubjectID, e.ID AS EventID, e.StartDate, e.EventTypeId ,e.EventTypeOther ,et.[Type] as EventType INTO #ContactCardEvent FROM #TempContactCard cc INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject es ON es.SubjectId = cc.ID INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.Event e ON e.id = es.even.d AND (e.StartDate IN (SELECT NextEvent FROM #NextEvent) OR (@OnlyNextScheduledEvent = 0 AND e.StartDate >= GetDate())
) inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventType] et on et.ID = e.EventTypeId
IF @RecruiterId IS NOT NULL BEGIN
DELETE FROM #ContactCardEvent WHERE EventID NOT IN ( SELECT e.EventId FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventOwners] p INNER JOIN #ContactCardEvent e ON p.[EventId] = e.EventID WHERE [OwnerId] = @RecruiterId ) END
SELECT ce.EventID ,COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS Recruiter ,COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(rp.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RecruiterShortName ,rp.[rowguid] AS RecruiterID ,ce.EventTypeOther ,ce.EventType INTO #EventVisibilityList FROM #ContactCardEvent ce INNER JOIN [RSSOSS].[USMC].[EventOwners] p ON ce.EventID = p.EventID INNER JOIN #Recrui.ngPerson rp ON p.OwnerId = rp.rowguid WHERE (@RecruiterId IS NULL) OR (OwnerId =@RecruiterId)
SELECT dis.nct cc.ID AS ApplicantAssetID ,cc.ID AS CardID ,cc.DatePrepared AS CreateDate ,COALESCE(RTRIM(cc.LastName), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(cc.FirstName), SPACE(0)) AS ApplicantAssetName ,er.Recruiter AS Recruiter ,er.RecruiterShortName ,er.RecruiterID ,cce.EventID AS EventID ,cce.StartDate AS EventDate ,er.RecruiterShortName ,cce.EventTypeOther ,cce.EventType FROM #TempContactCard cc INNER JOIN #ContactCardEvent cce ON cce.SubjectID = cc.ID INNER JOIN #EventVisibilityList er ON er.EventID = cce.EventID WHERE cce.StartDate >= @ScheduledEventsStart AND cce.StartDate < @ScheduledEventsEnd AND (cce.EventTypeId = @EventTypeId OR @EventTypeId IS NULL)
DROP TABLE #Recrui.ngPerson DROP TABLE #TempContactCard DROP TABLE #NextEvent DROP TABLE #ContactCardEvent DROP TABLE #EventVisibilityList
